Status.description: The status of the contact - inactive contacts are not used, nor showed in lists

Primary Email.description: The primary email used for communicating with the contact

Outro.html: You will be created a new customer.... summary page

Account Role.description: The roles a person can have with the account. (Billing, Primary, Aministrator)

Is Public.description: Controls if external users may use / assign this role

Contact Information.description: The way of contacting a contact or account

Domain.description: The homepage domain name / host where the customer can have quotation forms embeded

Security Role Permission.description: The Many to Many relationship between security roles and permissions
